com.madrobot.db.orm

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madrobot.db.orm.Database

  • public class Database
extends Object
    Represents a database to be used by Android Active Record entities.
    See Also:
    DatabaseClient

                      String dbName,
                      int dbVersion)
                               throws DBException

      • setBuilder

        public static void setBuilder(DatabaseBuilder builder)
        Initializes Database framework. This method must be called for each used database only once before using database. This is required for proper setup static attributes of the Database
        Parameters:
        builder -

         String whereClause,
         String[] whereArgs)
        Delete from a table in the database
        Parameters:
        table - The table to delete from.
        whereClause - The condition to match (Don't include WHERE).
        whereArgs - The arguments to replace "?" with.
        Returns:
        The number of rows affected.

        public void open()
        Opens or creates the database file. Uses external storage if present, otherwise uses local storage.

        selectColumns - The columns to select.
        where - The condition to match (Don't include "where").
        whereArgs - The arguments to replace "?" with.
        groupBy -
        having -
        orderBy -
        limit -
        Returns:
        A cursor over the data returned.
        Throws:
        DBException - is database is null or closed
